name: Build Robots with FRIENDS
description:
Create & Collect robots with your friends! Are you and your friends Robot Lovers!? Do you sometimes catch yourself singing ""Dōmo arigatō, Mr. Roboto" ??? If so you are going to have a blast with this fun interactive sticker app.

Send your friends an invite to help build a robot! Once you've finished building the robot together it will be added to you sticker collection for future use.

These stickers are easy to share, silly, funny, comical and colourful Build Robots with Friends is making texting funner than ever.
